text: Electric cars have a road trip problem, even for the secretary of energy  —  When Secretary of Energy Jennifer Granholm set out on a four-day electric-vehicle road trip this summer, she knew charging might be a challenge.  But she probably didn't expect anyone to call the cops.

Age and elected office: Concerns about performance outweigh benefits of experience  —  In the eyes of Americans, age brings experience and seniority in elected office, but that's outweighed by concerns that elected officials might be “out of touch” or unable to do the job past the age of 75.
